root: ^(I grip the handle of the door and give it a tug. It barely jostles, the handle firmly in place.)
^I told you it was locked already. Did you think I was lying?
^Can’t always trust a politician. I had to check myself to make sure.
^(Though Rudolph was right. This thing is sturdy. Too sturdy just for a little game. Garry really doesn’t want people to get out of these rooms.)
^(Looking closer, there’s some writing on the door.)
^(These numbers as words are a bit of a stretch…)
